fn.p: Competing Interests: William K. Bleser discloses past consulting fees from Merck unrelated to this research. Daniel A. Salmon discloses consulting fees and research grants from Merck, Pfizer, and Walgreens unrelated to this research. No other financial disclosures were reported. This does not alter our adherence to PLOS ONE policies on sharing data and materials.
